column4: I'm tired of constantly shifting my SIM card between phone and pc (mobile internet plan...) - when my pc can theoretically handle calls and my bluetooth headset couldn't care less which device it's connected to...
if it's 3g modem for a pc I've not found one with voice hardware in it
when my device was still running android, it could make calls...
sorry misunderstood it was a usb/minipci for pc type device.
